user_query: I want to know the current block number on the Binance Smart Chain testnet network. Additionally, can you give me the full data of the transaction with the hash 0xabcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890?

TaskList.description: Query the current block number on the Binance Smart Chain testnet network.
Retrieve the full transaction data for the given transaction hash.
